General.Name: SanDi Properties Co Ltd
General.Description: SanDi Properties Co.,Ltd. engages in the construction of commercial and industrial buildings. It also engages in residential lease and sale, real estate trading, and distribution of other department stores businesses. The company was formerly known as Yu Foong International Corporation. SanDi Properties Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1944 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
